tit.cmt: タイトルであるため、an を削除しました。

sen.j: 島物（しまもの）とは茶道具の分類の一種である。
sen.e: Shimamono is a type of classification of the tea utensils.
Shimamono is a type of classification of tea utensils.
Shimamono is a type of classification of tea utensils.

sen.j: 舶来製品の中で中国製を「唐物」、朝鮮半島製を「高麗物」と呼ぶが、これ以外を特に「島物」と呼んでいる。
sen.e: Imported products made in China were called 'Karamono' and those made in Korean peninsula were called 'Koraimono', but all other imports were referred to as 'Shimamono'.
Imported products made in China are called 'Karamono' and those made in Korean Peninsula are called 'Koraimono,' but all other imports are particularly referred to as 'Shimamono.'
sen.cmt: were→are,peninsula→Peninsula,カンマ、ピリオドの位置を修正しました。「特に」を補いました。
sen.e: Imported products made in China are called 'Karamono' and those made in Korean Peninsula are called 'Koraimono,' but all other imports are particularly referred to as 'Shimamono.'
Main types
Main types
Main types

sen.j: 呂宋（るそん）：フィリピンのルソン経由でもたらされた陶器（茶壺参照）。
sen.e: Luzon: Earthenwares brought in via Luzon, Philippines (Refer to Chatsubo).
Luzon: Earthenwares brought in via Luzon, Philippines (Refer to Chatsubo.)
sen.cmt: ピリオドの位置を修正しました。
sen.e: Luzon: Earthenwares brought in via Luzon, Philippines (Refer to Chatsubo.)

sen.j: 安南（あんなん）：ベトナム製の染付け陶器。
sen.e: Annan: Blue and white wares made in Vietnam.
Annan: Blue and white wares made in Vietnam.
Annan: Blue and white wares made in Vietnam.

sen.j: 南蛮（なんばん）：東南アジア系統の焼締めの陶器の総称。
sen.e: Nanban: General term for Southeast Asia line Yakishime earthenwares.
Nanban: General term for Southeast Asian group Yakishime earthenwares.
Nanban: General term for Southeast Asian group Yakishime earthenwares.

sen.j: ハンネラ：南蛮焼の一種。
sen.e: Hannera: A type of Nanbanyaki.
Hannera: A type of Nanbanyaki.
Hannera: A type of Nanbanyaki.

sen.j: 砂張（さはり）：銅を主とする合金であるが、特に東南アジア系統の製品を指すことがある。
sen.e: Sahari: Refers to mainly copper mixed metals, but sometimes refers especially to Southeast Asia line products.
Sahari: Refers to mainly copper mixed metals, but sometimes refers especially to Southeast Asian group products.
sen.cmt: Asia line→Asian group と修正しました。
sen.e: Sahari: Refers to mainly copper mixed metals, but sometimes refers especially to Southeast Asian group products.

sen.j: 独楽（こま）：タイなどで作られた漆器で、同心円状に塗られた色漆が回転する独楽に似ることから称される。
sen.e: Koma: Lacquerwares made in Thailand and other countries that are referred to by that name as the colored lacquer painted in a concentric circle style resembles a koma (spinning top).
Koma: Lacquerwares made in Thailand and other countries, named as the colored lacquer painted in a concentric circle style resembles a koma (spinning top).
sen.cmt: 文の流れをよりスムースに修正しました。
sen.e: Koma: Lacquerwares made in Thailand and other countries, named as the colored lacquer painted in a concentric circle style resembles a koma (spinning top).

sen.j: 蒟醤（きんま）：タイ、ミャンマーで作られる漆器で、細かな線刻紋様に特徴がある。
sen.e: Kinma: Lacquerwares made in Thailand and Myanmar characterized by fine line engraving pattern.
Kinma: Lacquerwares made in Thailand and Myanmar characterized by the fine line engraving pattern.
Kinma: Lacquerwares made in Thailand and Myanmar characterized by the fine line engraving pattern.
